constituent: accept, birdhouse, birdcage, claw, vulture, crown, crotch
koohiiStory1: The bird house is the brothel (someone else said so) and of course everyone is welcome - thay accept any crotch.
koohiiStory2: A birdhouse is a whorehouse that will accept any crotch even those with STDs. (Image: a birdhouse whorehouse with every kind of bird coming and going. Some old madam at the front hole accepts everyone, even the nasty old crows).
myStory: nhận. bắt. chấp nhận. móng cho vào đánh nhau
readingExamples: 受かる (う.かる), 受ける (う.ける)
words: to inherit, to succeed, to take over
to be accepted, to receive (an application)
to catch, to stop the blow, to react to, to take
to undertake, to take up, to take over, to be responsible for, to guarantee, to contract (disease)
to receive, to get, to accept, to take, to interpret, to understand
undertake, take charge of, take, accept, be responsible for, guarantee
